name: ListUserClientRefreshTokens
description:
Retrieve refresh tokens for a specific user and client.

This tool retrieves all refresh tokens issued for a specified user and client in the Okta system. It should be called when you need to manage or audit tokens related to user access.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of an existing Okta user to retrieve refresh tokens for.

value_schema.description: ID of an existing Okta user

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: The ID of the client application for which to list refresh tokens.

parameters.name: include_scope_details
parameters.description: Set to 'true' to include scope details in the response. Valid value: `scope`.

value_schema.description: Valid value: `scope`. If specified, scope details are included in the `_embedded` attribute.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: An opaque string for continuing pagination, obtained from the `Link` response header.

value_schema.description: The cursor to use for pagination. It is an opaque string that specifies your current location in the list and is obtained from the `Link` response header. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).

parameters.name: token_return_limit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of refresh tokens to return.

value_schema.description: Specifies the number of tokens to return
